definition: to cooperate/to harmonize/to help/to assist/to join

square/power or involution (math.)/upright/honest/fair and square/direction/side/party (to a contract, dispute etc)/place/method/prescription (medicine)/just when/only or just/classifier for square things/abbr. for square or cubic meter
difference/discrepancy/to differ/error/to err/to make a mistake
to differ from/to fall short of/lacking/wrong/inferior/Taiwan pr. [cha1]

sentences.english: It not only avoids computing cross-covariance matrices but also improves local estimation accuracy.
sentences.chinese: 避免了计算互协方差阵，且能改善局部估计的精度。

sentences.english: The estimation of noise covariance matrix is based on iterative procedure in ML.
sentences.chinese: 最大似然法采用了迭代的方法来估计噪声的协方差矩。

sentences.english: Objective To study the effect of covariate imbalance on analysis of covariance.
sentences.chinese: 目的探讨协变量的不均衡对协方差分析的影响。

sentences.english: The COVAR() function calculates the covariance of two cell ranges.
sentences.chinese: 函数计算两个单元格范围的协方差。

definition: to fit (data to a model)/a (close) fit

pinyin: zui4 da4 si4 ran2 gu1 ji4
